# SliderBar [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/html5crew/simple-sliderbar.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/html5crew/simple-sliderbar) *SliderBar is a simple and lightweight vanilla JS slider.* ## Bower ``` bower install simple-sliderbar ``` ## Usage ```html
``` ## Options You can add options to input attributes or arguments object. - min : Number - max : Number - start : Number - current : Number - orientation : String - "horizontal" (default) - "vertical" - mode : String - "nosteps" (default) - "steps" ## Demo You can use 'grunt server' command * dev version : http://localhost:9000/samples/dev.html * dist version : http://localhost:9000/samples/dist.html ## Grunt ``` grunt server // task : serve grunt build // task : jshint, clean, css2js, concat, uglify ``` ## Change Log * 1.0.3 : vertical mode position bugfix * 1.0.0 : first release
